contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Tyranny (Album) | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[The Generators]] <!-- Commented out because image was deleted: | Cover = The generators tyranny .jpg --> | Released = 2001 | Recorded = [[99/01]] | Genre = [[Punk rock]], [[Alternative rock|Alternative]], [[Rock music|Rock]] | Length = | Label = [[People Like You Records]], [[TKO Records]] | Producer = Rich Mouser | Reviews = | | Last album = '''[[Burning Ambition]]'''<br/>(2000) | This album = '''Tyranny (Album)'''<br/>(2001) | Next album = ''[[State of the Nation (EP)|State of the Nation]]''<br/>(2007) }} '''''Tyranny''''', released in 2001, is the third [[album]] by [[alternative rock|alternative]]/[[punk rock]] band, [[The Generators]]. ==Track listing== #"Down In The City (Doosky/Snow/Dagger) #"Murder (Doosky/Dagger) #"Keep On Running (Snow/Dagger) #"Hijacked (Doosky/Dagger) #"Summer Of Unrest (Snow/Dagger) #"Tyranny (Doosky/Dagger) #"Dead At 16 (Doosky/Dagger) #"Rats (Snow/Dagger) #"Us Against Them (Doosky/Dagger) #"All Night Long (Doosky/Dagger) #"Suburban Bitch (Osterberg/Dagger) #"Coming Down (Doosky/Dagger) ==Credits== *[[Doug Dagger]] - [[Vocals]] *[[Sir Doosky]] - [[Lead guitar|Lead]], [[Rhythm guitar|Rhythm Guitars]], [[Backing vocalist|Backup Vocals]] *[[Mike Snow]] - [[Lead guitar|Lead]], [[Rhythm guitar|Rhythm Guitars]], & [[Backing vocalist|Backup Vocals]] *[[Dirty Ernie]] - [[Drummer|Drums]], [[Backing vocalist|Backup Vocals]] *[[Don Osterberg]] - [[Bassist|Bass]], [[Backing vocalist|Backup Vocals]] *[[Rich Mouser]] - [[Backing vocalist|Back up Vocals]] *[[Bryant Ortega]] - [[Bassist|Bass]] on "All Night Long & Dead At 16" {{DEFAULTSORT:Tyranny (The Generators Album)}} [[Category:The Generators albums]] [[Category:2001 albums]]
